title.narrative: Active participation of Timor Leste citizens in promoting transparency and accountability of basic service delivery

description.narrative:
The overall objective to which this action aims to contribute is: “Citizens of Timor Leste live in an inclusive and empowered society where district and national Governments are transparent and accountable in planning and implementation of public service delivery”.
The project has two specific objectives: 1. Citizens in target areas are empowered to actively engage with local authorities to influence policy thus improve the quality of basic service delivery. 2. Civil Society is strengthened and positively influences national Government transparency and accountability related to revenue, budget allocation and basic service delivery.;
